problem_text_cn: 如图所示,河堤横断面迎水坡AB的坡角是30°,堤高BC=5m,则坡面AB的长度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the slope angle of the water-facing slope AB of the cross section of the river embankment is N_0, and the height of the embankment BC = N_1, then the length of the slope AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵河堤横断面迎水坡AB的坡角是30°,堤高BC=5m,∴sin30°=\frac{BC}{AB},∴AB=\frac{BC}{sin30{^°}}=10(m)．故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了坡脚的定义以及锐角三角函数,正确选择锐角三角函数关系是解题关键．
